source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第七
translation: Jewel-star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 7

source_sentence: 唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯
translation: Translated by the Tang Indian Tripiṭaka Prabhākaramitra

source_sentence: 陀羅尼品之餘
translation: the rest of the chapter on the dhāraṇī

source_sentence: ◎爾時，眾中有一大梵天王名曰妙音，位居十住摩訶薩地，若於梵中諸梵中尊，若於魔中諸魔中尊，若於釋中諸釋中尊，乃至毘沙門、毘樓茶、毘樓博叉、提頭賴吒、大自在、那羅延、阿修羅等，於諸天主天主中尊。
translation: At the time, there was a great Brahma king named Miaoyin among the multitude of gods who was ranked among the ten abodes of the Mahāsattva stage, among the Brahmā, among the Brahmā, among the Māra, among the Māra, among the Śākyamuni, among the Śākyamuni, and among the Vaiśravaṇa, Vairocana, Vīlapakṣa, Dhṛtarāṣṭra, Mahêśvara, Nārāyaṇa, and Asura, among the lords of the gods.

source_sentence: 是時，妙音梵王變作第一女人之形，色相圓滿威儀具足，以勝莊嚴而自莊嚴，於釋迦如來前合掌而坐。
translation: At the time, the Brahma King Maitreya took the form of the first woman, complete in appearance and manner, adorned himself with superior adornment, and sat down with his palms together in front of the Śākyamuni Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 以其兩手捧如意寶珠，為供養佛故，瞻仰尊顏目不異視，諸根寂然，不以諸相而觀如來。
translation: Holding a wish-granting jewel in each hand, he looked up at the venerable's face, didn't look away, and had his faculties at rest so that he didn't contemplate the Tathāgata with various forms.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告妙音梵天：「汝今何故目不暫瞬，乃至無相觀於我耶？
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān addressed the Brahmā Maitreya, "Why don't you take a moment to look at me, even though you're observing me without marks?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 頗有一法名為佛耶？
translation: Could it be that there is one thing called a Buddha?

source_sentence: 頗有一物可為名耶？
translation: Is there one thing that can be named?

source_sentence: 如貪瞋癡無明煩惱，有名物緣相，相緣無明，無明緣行，乃至廣說，相滅無明滅，行滅亦復如是。」
translation: As the afflictions of greed, anger, delusion, and ignorance refer to the characteristics of living things, the characteristics refer to ignorance, and ignorance refers to formations, and it's even explained in detail that it's likewise true that the characteristics cease, ignorance ceases, and formations cease."

source_sentence: 妙音梵天言：「誠如聖說。
translation: The Brahmā with the wonderful voice said, "It's just as the sages say.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 無明不可得。
translation: "Nescience is unobtainable.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若無明不可得者，彼十二有支從何而起？
translation: If nescience is inapprehensible, then where did those twelve components of existence come from?

source_sentence: 可從虛空生耶？
translation: Can it arise from space?

source_sentence: 虛空復不可得。」
translation: Space is again unobtainable."

source_sentence: 佛言：「如是，如是。
translation: The Buddha said, "So it is, so it is.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 一切法如虛空。
translation: All dharmas are like space.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 虛空無物無相，非闇非明，不分別無分別，無成無壞不可說，無一物無分齊斷一切物。
translation: Space is without things or marks, neither dark nor light, undiscriminated and undiscerning, without formation or decay, and inexplicable, without a single thing or division that equally ends all things.

source_sentence: 如是，如是。
translation: So it is, and so it is.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 佛法真際斷，佛法如如，佛法不取此彼岸，佛法不減不增。
translation: The true limits of the Buddha's teaching are cut off, the Buddha's teaching is as it is, the Buddha's teaching doesn't grasp either side, and the Buddha's teaching doesn't decrease or increase.

source_sentence: 佛法非陰界入，體無分齊，若實若物若相一切皆無，佛法無動無住不妄置立，佛法一切言語道斷。」
translation: The Buddha's teaching is not aggregates or elements, its essence is not distinct, whether real or material or characteristic, all are nonexistent, the Buddha's teaching is motionless, unstable, and not falsely established, and the Buddha's teaching is cut off from all speech and path."

source_sentence: 說此法時，八萬四千眾生發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: When he spoke this teaching, 84,000 sentient beings aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 時，有惡魔作如是言：「若佛法如虛空，非物不可說，汝以何等智慧精進，劬勞方便惱亂於我，破我境界，乃至奪我境界眾生，復教眾生不來不去無物幻術？
translation: At the time, some evil demon said, "If the Buddha's teaching is like space and doesn't belong to things that can't be explained, with what kind of zealous effort of wisdom do you laboriously disturb me, destroy my objective realm, and even rob sentient beings of my objective realm, and then teach sentient beings that don't come or go without the illusion of things?

source_sentence: 汝若如是教眾生者，不復見彼煩惱行起。
translation: "If you thus teach sentient beings, you won't see their afflictive actions arise again.

source_sentence: 汝以何故，為我於此娑婆世界，召集如是無量無數諸佛世尊、菩薩摩訶薩，及大聲聞、梵釋護世、摩醯首羅，有大神通、有大加護，乃至天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等大眾，普皆同來滿於一切諸佛剎土，令此無慈大梵說如是呪？
translation: Why is it that you summoned such an incalculable and countless number of world-honored buddhas, bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, great śrāvakas, Brahmās, Śākhyus, Mahêśvara, great supernormal powers, great guardians, and even gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, kaluras, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, and other great multitudes to fill all the buddha-lands with you in this sahā world, so that this compassionless Brahma would recite such a dhāraṇī?

source_sentence: 我等既聞，普皆頭痛受大苦惱，乃至令身上下爛臭。」
translation: When we hear this, we all suffer from headaches and great pain, and it causes our bodies to rot and stink."

source_sentence: 爾時，復有六萬八千諸魔王等，及其魔眾無量無邊，極惡夜叉、羅剎、鳩槃茶、毘舍遮等，一切同聲唱如是言：「我等徒黨即聞呪時，增益頭痛，身皆爛臭，受極重苦。」
translation: At the time, 68,000 Māra kings and their armies of Māra, numberless and limitless, were all singing with one voice, saying, "When our group hears this dhāraṇī, it gives us headaches, makes our bodies stink, and causes us to experience great suffering."

source_sentence: 釋迦如來告彼魔言：「憶我昔日菩提樹下坐道場時，汝魔軍眾遍在八十由旬及以虛空，皆悉充滿欲來害我，乃至今日復將軍眾無量俱胝共來害我。
translation: The Śākyamuni Tathāgata told that demon, "Remember when I was sitting on the site of enlightenment under the bodhi tree, your army of demons spread out over 80 leagues of space and were all filled with people who wanted to harm me, and today you've also gathered an army of measureless koṭīs to harm me.

source_sentence: 我亦如是召集無量無數諸佛世尊、菩薩摩訶薩，乃至人、非人等普來集會，為欲令汝及餘諸魔，人、非人等悉降伏故；滅一切苦得大涅槃寂滅樂故；亦為教汝不來不去，無所有性如幻法故；一切趣一切滅一切起，生死愛流悉枯竭故；亦令汝等及一切邪見眾生，入無餘涅槃境界而般涅槃故。
translation: I've also thus summoned measureless and countless buddhas, bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, humans, and nonhumans to gather here in order to subdue you and the other Māras, humans and nonhumans alike; to cease all suffering and attain the great tranquil bliss of nirvāṇa; to teach you that you neither come nor go, that you lack [a] nature like an illusion; that all destinies, all cease, and all arise, and that the stream of craving for birth-and-death is completely dried up; and to cause you and all other sentient beings with wrong views to enter the state of nirvāṇa without remainder and [attain] parinirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 魔王！
translation: Demon king!

source_sentence: 汝等今者速發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，汝此頭痛當得解脫，漸漸修習性空佛法當得現前，及得諸佛境界，勝魔境界獲大利益。」
translation: Now, all of you quickly give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and you will be freed from this headache, gradually cultivate the Buddha-dharma of emptiness, and attain great benefit in the realms of the buddhas and beyond the realms of Māra."

source_sentence: 爾時，六萬八千諸魔，及其徒眾同聲唱言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, 68,000 Māra and their disciples all chanted with one voice, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等今發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Now, we've aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 云何當得自性空等佛法現前，乃至得佛勝妙境界希有利益？」
translation: How will we attain the manifestation of such buddha-teachings as emptiness of self-nature and even attain the rare benefit of the Buddha's surpassing and marvelous state?"

source_sentence: 時有惡魔作如是言：「縱復令我盡後邊身得重頭痛，我終不以如是諂幻發菩提心。」
translation: It was then that some evil demon said, "Even if I were to end up with a heavy headache in my later body, I would never arouse the mind of enlightenment with such a deceit."

source_sentence: 爾時，妙音大梵作如是言：「我今亦於一切佛前，以此佛剎微妙教法勇猛受持，於此五濁世界流布釋迦如來尊重之教。
translation: At the time, the Brahma Maitreya spoke thus, "Now, I too have courageously maintained the subtle teachings of this Buddha's buddha before all the buddhas and have disseminated the respected teachings of the Śākyamuni Tathāgata in this five turbid worlds.

source_sentence: 從今已往乃至釋迦滅度之後，我當令此法化常得熾然，隨有國土正信眾生，皆令不退速出魔網。
translation: From now on until after Śākyamuni's death, I will make this teaching always blazing, so that rightly faithful sentient beings in any land will be made not to regress and quickly escape the web of Māra.

source_sentence: 若此法門，世間不流行者，我令流行。
translation: If this teaching doesn't prevail in the world, I'll make it prevail.

source_sentence: 若已行處，令其信心倍復增廣，所有城邑聚落善男子、善女人等，我當擁護慈心將養，遮其非義示誨善義。
translation: Where it's practiced, I'll cause their faith to grow even more, and I'll support good men and good women in all the cities and villages, kindly nurturing them and refraining from teaching what's not the right thing to do.

source_sentence: 隨處有此不退魔場陀羅尼法門，乃至書持，亦隨有法師之處昇師子座，欲開示演說此法門時，先當於彼至心誦此陀羅尼章句，召喚於我并諸眷屬，我當自往彼法師所為作擁護，令聽法眾得大吉祥。」
translation: Wherever there's this nonretrogressing magic field dhāraṇī teaching or even writing, and wherever there's a teacher of the Dharma who ascends to the lion's seat and wants to explain the teaching, you must first recite this dhāraṇī phrase with all your heart, summoning me and my retinue, and I'll go to that teacher myself and offer my support, so that the people who hear the teaching will attain great good fortune."

source_sentence: 即於佛前，而說呪曰：「多地也他阿婆彌阿婆彌(一)　菴婆離菴婆離(二)　跋履軍闍那茶那茶(三)　補沙迦囉婆呵(四)　闍漏佉(五)　摩佉耶(六)　伊黎弭黎(七)　抧黎弭黎(八)　吉坻遮囉母陀離(九)　母陀囉母跛(十)娑婆呵(十一)「世尊！
translation: He then spoke the dhāraṇī before the Buddha, saying, "Dhātriyātapāyaṇī(1) āmbali-ambali(2) bhadra-kunjanātana(3) puṣyākara-vahā(4) jārakarabha(5) makhya(6) īri-vṛh(7) ḍarī-vṛh(8) kṛtyācara-mātṛ(9) mātṛrā-mālā(10) svāhā(11), 'Bhagavān!'

source_sentence: 隨有法師說法之處，要當先誦此呪章句，我以清淨天耳，在彼上界聞其音聲，而不往彼作守護者，我即欺誑過去未來現在一切諸佛已，亦莫令我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: "Whenever a Dharma teacher teaches the Dharma, he or she must first recite the verses of this dhāraṇī. If I were to hear its sound with the pure divine ear in the upper realms and didn't go there to guard it, I would deceive all the buddhas of the past, future, and present, and I wouldn't be allowed to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 然我決定往彼法師說法之所接足頂戴，亦與法師樂說辯才，又令法師及聽法眾一切病苦、惡見、惡作、邪疑之心悉令斷滅。
translation: Nevertheless, I'm determined to go to that Dharma teacher, accept his feet, venerate him, readily explain his eloquence, and cause him and the people who hear his teaching to end all illness and suffering, bad views, bad actions, and mistaken doubt.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 隨所方面說此法門，有能受持溫誦之者，我及眷屬當往彼所。
translation: Whatever aspect of this teaching there is, if there's someone who can retain and recite it, I and my retinue will go there.

source_sentence: 若有一切鬪諍飢饉病患憂惱內外怨敵、亢旱水澇寒熱失序風雨不時、惡見惡作者當令消滅。
translation: If there's any quarrel, hunger, famine, ill-health, grief, internal or external enemies, drought, flooding, cold, heat, disorder, wind, rain, or periods of bad views and bad actors, they'll cause them to cease.

source_sentence: 人及非人畜生等畏，及彼一切不吉祥夢，惡相惡人無有潤澤，苦澁惡味辛臭惡觸，如是諸患悉當斷除。
translation: Fears of humans and non-humans, animals, and so forth, and all their inauspicious dreams, bad appearances and people, lack of nourishment, and bitter, bad tastes, pungent smells, and bad tactile sensations will all be ended.

source_sentence: 乃至師子惡獸毒龍野牛豺狼，盜賊奸詐人非人等，無量諸畏悉皆斷滅。
translation: Up to lion, beast, poisonous dragon, bison, wolf, thief, fraudulent man, inhuman, and so forth, those countless fears will all be ended.

source_sentence: 為使眾生得樂具故，而令種種穀藥華果上味飲食，衣服舍宅氈褥臥具，果報成就悉皆充滿，隨有流通此法門處，不利益事我當遮之，利益之事當令成就。
translation: In order to provide sentient beings with the necessities for their happiness, I'll cause various grains, medicines, flowers, fruits, excellent tastes, foods, clothing, homes, blankets, mats, and bedding to be filled with the fruits of success, and I'll cover up whatever doesn't benefit them and cause the accomplishment of what does benefit them wherever this teaching circulates.

source_sentence: 若彼眾生信樂正法行善行者，我當誨示令福增長。
translation: If those sentient beings believe in and enjoy the right teaching and conduct good activities, I will instruct them so that their merits will increase.

source_sentence: 我今於此一切佛前立大誓願，唯願諸佛同憐愍我，令我所作佛事大願成就，願成就故意所依處皆令滿足，願滿足故即我丈夫所作成就。」
translation: Now, I've made a great vow before all of these buddhas that the buddhas will have compassion on me, cause me to accomplish the great vow of the buddha-works I do, fulfill the vow by intentionally depending on it, and fulfill the vow by accomplishing what my husband has done."

source_sentence: 爾時，釋迦如來為首，與一切諸佛，同共憐愍攝受妙音大梵故，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, who was the head, joined with all the buddhas in kindly accepting the wonderful voice of Brahmā, and said, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 我等當以陀羅尼呪與汝受持。
translation: We will give you a dhāraṇī spell to memorize.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 若一切釋梵護世四天王，及諸餘天、龍、夜叉、阿修羅等，於佛聖教起不淨心者，以呪力故皆當攝伏。」
translation: If all the four heavenly kings of Śākyamuni and Brahmā who protect the world, as well as other gods, dragons, yakṣas, asuras, and so forth, give rise to an impure mind based on the Buddha's noble teaching, they will all be subdued because of the power of the spell."

source_sentence: 妙音大梵作如是建立大丈夫所作事時，十方諸佛同唱是言：「當願妙音大梵願力成就。」
translation: When the Bodhisattva thus established what great men do, the buddhas of the ten directions all said together, "May the power of the Bodhisattva's vow be fulfilled."

source_sentence: 即說呪曰：「多地他者問池(一)　問茶跛履侈提(二)　呵茂摩(三)　呵茂摩(四)　娑囉叉(五)　婆羅九娑弭佉(六)　跛履婆呵(七)　遮囉麼(八)　也他者鎪比佉阿茂羅跛履侈提(九)　薩婆部駄地史恥坻(十)　娑婆呵(十一)」爾時，釋迦牟尼世尊說是呪已，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: He then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying, "Dadītapiṭaka (a) Maitreya Lumbinī (b) Homa (c) Homa (d) Sālaka (e) Bālājasamika (f) Lumbinī (g) Cāramā (h) Yajñadapiṭaka Amogha Lumbinī (i) Sarvâstivāda Deshita (j) Sadvāhā (k)." After speaking this dhāraṇī, the Bhagavān addressed them, saying, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 此陀羅尼能令一切魔及釋梵護世，諸餘天、龍、夜叉、阿修羅有大光澤，攝受一切人、非人等，皆令迴向諸佛功德。
translation: This dhāraṇī will cause all Māra and Brahmā to protect the world, and the other gods, dragons, yakṣas, and asuras will have a great radiance that will gather in all people and non-people alike and cause them to dedicate themselves to the merits of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 汝今若能受持如是陀羅尼者，即是能作大丈夫所作事也。」
translation: Now, if you can accept and uphold such a dhāraṇī, you'll be able to do the work of a great man."

source_sentence: 妙音大梵言：「婆伽婆！
translation: The wonderful-sounding Brahma said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今以是女人形相，當善護持一切女人，當善成熟一切女人。
translation: Now, in this woman's form, I will guard all women well and mature all women well.

source_sentence: 婆伽婆！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有女人厭惡女身求丈夫相，應當受持讀誦書寫供養此經，我當往彼女人之所滿其所願。
translation: If there's a woman who's disillusioned with the female body and seeks a husband's form, she should memorize, recite, write, and make offerings to this sūtra, and I will go to that woman's place to fulfill her vow.

source_sentence: 若有女人厭患男女，亦當受持讀誦書寫供養此呪，如是女人持呪力故，雖未離欲更不受胎。
translation: If there's a woman who's disillusioned with the idea of a man or woman, she must also accept, recite, write, and make offerings to this dhāraṇī, for the sake of the woman's adherence to its power, even though she's not yet free of desire, she won't be reborn.

source_sentence: 復有女人為他輕賤被人欺凌失諸樂受，亦應讀誦此陀羅尼，以陀羅尼威神力故，一切願滿諸樂成就。」
translation: Another woman who is despised by others and bullied by others and loses the pleasures she enjoys should also recite this dhāraṇī, for it will fulfill all her vows and accomplish her happiness because of the dhāraṇī's authoritative power."

source_sentence: 爾時，大梵為供養故，為護持此陀羅尼神力法門故，為滿一切眾生願故，即以兩手捧摩尼寶珠，奉施十方一切諸佛。
translation: It was then that the Brahma, wishing to make offerings, to safeguard the Dhāraṇī's authoritative power as a Dharma teaching, and to fulfill the vows of all sentient beings, took a precious maṇi pearl in each hand and presented it to all the buddhas in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 爾時，諸佛同發聲言：「如是，如是。
translation: At that point, the buddhas all spoke together, saying, "So it is, so it is.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 願汝常能護持佛教，滿眾生願。」
translation: May you always uphold Buddhism and fulfill the vows of sentient beings."

source_sentence: ◎◎寶星陀羅尼經攝受妙法品第七爾時，會中有菩薩摩訶薩，名妙慧通達，在勝珠炎如來前坐，去釋迦如來不遠，於牟忽多頃現作梵形，於剎那頃現作魔形，乃至現釋天形、他化自在天形。
translation: Śrīgarbha-sūtra, Chapter 7 of the Awakening of the Wonderful Dharma At the time, there was a bodhisattva in the assembly named Mūlasarvâstivāda, who was sitting in front of the Tathāgata Jubilant and not far from the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, who took on the form of Brahmā in the instant of Mokṣadatta, the form of Māra in the instant of a flash, and even the form of the Śākyamuni Heaven and the form of the Paranirmitavaśavartin Heaven.

source_sentence: 又復現作諸天主形，化樂、兜率、夜摩天形，四天王天大自在形，或現夜叉、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、羅剎、餓鬼、毘舍遮、鳩槃茶、剎利、婆羅門、毘舍、首陀等形。
translation: They also take the form of gods, the gods of Nandana, Tuṣita, and Yama, the gods of the four heavenly kings, or they may take the form of a yakṣa, asura, garuḍa, kiṃnara, mahoraga, rāṣa, hungry ghost, piśācī, kumbhāṇḍa, warriors, brāhmaṇas, piśās, or śūdra.

source_sentence: 或現師子、象、馬、水牛等形，乃至示現種種畜生之形。
translation: It might take the form of a lion, elephant, horse, buffalo, or even show the form of various animals.

source_sentence: 於剎那頃或現鳥樹山果，衣服臥具種種醫藥，寶莊嚴器。
translation: In a moment's time, they might show the form of a bird, a mountain, fruit, clothing, bedding, various medicines, or a container adorned with jewelry.

source_sentence: 牟忽多頃示現比丘、比丘尼像，一剎那頃示現佛像，或現八萬四千種種色相，乃至方圓處色淨妙形貌。
translation: For a moment, he might display an image of a monk or nun, or for a moment he might display an image of the Buddha, or he might display 84,000 different forms and shapes, or he might display a pure and beautiful form in a round place.

source_sentence: 爾時，長老富樓那彌多羅尼子，即起合掌問釋迦牟尼如來言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the elder Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra rose and put his palms together and asked the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何因何緣，而此菩薩有如是八萬四千淨妙之相？
translation: What cause and condition does this bodhisattva have such 84,000 pure and marvelous characteristics?

source_sentence: 方圓處色種種類身？」
translation: What kinds of bodies are there in the vastness of space?"

source_sentence: 佛告富樓那：「此菩薩有大功德攝受力境界，一切聲聞辟支佛所不能及，妙慧通達菩薩摩訶薩，隨彼住受力境界成熟眾生，一切聲聞辟支佛非其地，隨是眾生遍滿十方無量無數，若淨不淨諸佛剎土，常以無障礙慧眼，如所願如所意，如是衰惱所纏，如所歸依。
translation: The Buddha told Pūrṇa, "This bodhisattva has a realm of great merit and gathering power that's beyond the ability of all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, a bodhisattva with marvelous wisdom and penetrating insight who follows that realm of gathering power to mature sentient beings, beyond the reach of all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and follows those sentient beings throughout the measureless and incalculable buddha-lands in the ten directions, whether pure or impure, always seeing with unobstructed wisdom as they wish and intend, thus tethered by affliction, and thus relying on them.

source_sentence: 此菩薩入如是三昧，以是色貌威儀，隨處方圓，種種色相具足，乃至佛形，如所化度眾生，皆安置三乘住不退地。
translation: When this bodhisattva enters such concentration, his appearance and bearing are such that he follows every direction, is fully endowed with various forms and characteristics, up to the Buddha's form, and trains sentient beings in the three vehicles to abide in the ground of nonretrogression as he has trained them.

source_sentence: 若眾生為貪不自在種種愛求，為斷彼貪故與其所須，然後置於不退之地。
translation: If sentient beings crave various desires that aren't self-complacent, they are given what they need to stop their cravings, and then they're placed in the ground of nonretrogression.

source_sentence: 若病患須醫藥者即與其藥，然後立於不退地也。
translation: If someone who's ill needs medicine, then they'll be given medicine, and then they'll be placed in the stage of nonretrogression.

source_sentence: 富樓那！
translation: Pūrṇa!

source_sentence: 此妙慧通達菩薩，於一日中能度如恒河沙數眾生，解脫諸苦置於三乘不退之地。」
translation: In a single day, this bodhisattva with marvelous penetration of wisdom can save sentient beings like the sands of the Ganges River and liberate them from suffering and place them in the stage of nonretrogression in the three vehicles."

source_sentence: 富樓那白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Pūrṇa said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此善男子成就眾生故，為丈夫事其來久如？」
translation: Does this good man accomplish the success of sentient beings and serve his husband for a long time to come?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「阿僧祇佛剎微塵數劫，此善男子發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，經爾所時得三昧力加護，建丈夫事已來，復更經六十四阿僧祇劫。」
translation: The Buddha said, "It's been a great many incalculably long eons since this good man aroused the resolve to attain unsurpassed, corrected, and complete enlightenment and attained the power of samādhi to establish himself as a great man."

source_sentence: 富樓那言：「妙慧菩薩從此久如，於何佛剎當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提？」
translation: Pūrṇa said, "Since this long time, what buddha bodhisattva of wondrous wisdom will attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「更經二十六百千大劫，過彼已後有大劫名能度，世界名摩尼華鬚，其國眾生皆壽四十千歲。
translation: The Buddha said, "After another 26,000 great eons, there's a great eon named Can-Do, and the world is called Manihāvatāra, and the sentient beings in that country all live to be 40,000 years old.

source_sentence: 妙慧菩薩於五逆不善法惡眾生中，當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，其佛號曰開敷無邊光如來、阿羅呵、三藐三佛陀。
translation: Among the five heinous, unwholesome, and unwholesome beings, the Bodhisattva of Marvelous Wisdom will achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, and his buddha will be called the Tathāgata of Unlimited Illumination, the Ālāha, and the Samyak-saṃbuddha.

source_sentence: 佛於四十千年中恒作佛事，以三乘法成熟眾生，乃至令其得般涅槃。
translation: For 40,000 years, the Buddha always performed buddha-works, ripening sentient beings with the teachings of the three vehicles, up to the point where they attained parinirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 於是已後無邊光佛，以無餘涅槃而般涅槃。」
translation: After that, the Buddha of Boundless Light attained parinirvāṇa with nirvāṇa without remainder."

source_sentence: 富樓那言：「世尊！
translation: Pūrṇa said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此菩薩先所成熟彼諸眾生，當生何處？」
translation: Where will these sentient beings born that this bodhisattva has previously matured?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「此菩薩先作如是不自攝受願：『十方世界於一一方微塵數等無間佛剎，彼剎土中所有諸佛令我得見，我若不見彼等諸佛，不取阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: The Buddha said, "This bodhisattva first made this vow that wasn't self-contained: 'In one tiny particle of the world in the ten directions, there are an unlimited number of buddha-temples, and I've been allowed to see all the buddhas in those buddha-lands; if I don't see those buddhas, I won't attain unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 我先所行菩薩道時，勸發眾生，最初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，示教建立於六波羅蜜。
translation: When I was first practicing the bodhisattva path, I encouraged sentient beings to initially arouse the mind of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment and showed them how to build the six perfections.

source_sentence: 已成熟者，遍於十方諸佛剎土。
translation: Those who had ripened it were spread throughout the buddha-lands in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 已得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，亦令我見，以如是三摩提莊嚴力加護故，於十方無間一一佛剎微塵等諸剎土中，能為如是大丈夫事，及彼諸佛剎中作五逆罪不可治眾生，乃至具足不善法眾生，於彼命終，乘我願力皆生我國。
translation: Those who have attained unsurpassed, corrected, and accomplished enlightenment also allow me to see that because of the protection afforded by the power of such samādhi adornment, I can perform such great heroic deeds in each of the dusty buddha-lands in the ten directions, and that sentient beings in those buddha-lands who commit the five heinous crimes and are untreatable, or sentient beings who are fully endowed with unskillful qualities, will be born in my country by the power of my vow when their lives end.

source_sentence: 我為菩薩，令是眾生種諸善根置不退地，然後我身當取正覺。』
translation: As a bodhisattva, I'll cause these sentient beings to plant their good roots and stand on the ground of nonretrogression, and then I myself will attain right awakening.'

source_sentence: 妙慧菩薩有是大願。」
translation: That's the great vow of the Bodhisattva Sumeru."

source_sentence: 爾時，十方諸佛剎土俱來菩薩同作是言：「我等今者普來雲集至此佛剎，今得見於大師所得有如是相，及見如是大集會大悲具足諸菩薩等，及以昔所未聞過去、未來、現在諸佛金剛法等因緣法心能建立摧碎陀羅尼印句差別門記法式擁護，令我得聞。」
translation: At that point, the bodhisattvas from all the buddha bases in the ten directions all came together and said, "Now, we've all come here in clouds to this buddha bases, and now we've been able to see that the great teacher has such characteristics, that he has assembled such a great assembly of bodhisattvas who are fully endowed with great compassion, and that because of the past, future, and present Buddha's adamantine principles and other causes and conditions, the mind can establish the Dhāraṇī of the seal of destruction, the phrase of the distinctive approach, and the method of recording the Dharma, so that I can hear them."

source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經授記品第八
translation: Jewel Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Chapter 8 of the Awakening of Wisdom

source_sentence: 爾時，阿閦如來普告一切大眾，作如是言：「我等勸汝諸善男子，梵釋四王、天、龍、夜叉、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人、非人等，諸有於佛教得清淨信來此集會者，得見一切諸佛世尊，及諸菩薩摩訶薩，釋梵天王、人、非人等普來雲集，如是大相甚為難得。
translation: At the time, Akṣobhya Tathāgata addressed the entire assembly and said, "We encourage you, good sons, to come to this rally with the four brahma and Śakra kings, gods, dragons, yakṣas, asuras, kaluras, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and others who have attained pure faith in Buddhism and have come to see all the buddhas, world-honored ones, bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, Śakra kings, humans, and nonhumans gathered in great clouds, for such a great feature is quite difficult to attain.

source_sentence: 汝等今見此處集會，皆應於如來前各各自願。
translation: Now, when you see this gathering, you should each make your own vows in front of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 汝今於此佛剎，若現在世及未來世，必能護持如是妙法，令三寶種常得熾然。」
translation: Here at this Buddha's buddha, in the present and future worlds, you will surely be able to safeguard such a wonderful teaching so that the seeds of the Three Treasures will always be blazing."

source_sentence: 爾時，有魔名曰息華，以七寶器盛種種華果及諸穀萌芽，自變其形為女人像，具足微妙第一端正，色相圓滿無與等者，第一衣服嚴飾其身，持寶器華以供養佛，作如是言：「一切諸佛世尊一心念我，若此世界及餘世界，所有諸佛已集會者，如是一切諸佛世尊，我今以一切華果諸穀萌芽，滿於寶器奉獻諸佛。
translation: At the time, a demon named Xiehua filled a container of seven treasures with various flowers, fruits, and sprouts of grain, transformed his form into the image of a woman, complete with the subtlest and most noble features, of perfect form and shape, and adorned with the finest clothing, held a container of treasures and flowers to offer to the Buddha, and said, "Bhagavān, the buddhas are unified in their mind, and if all the buddhas of this world and the other worlds have already assembled, thus are the buddhas honored, I will now offer the buddhas a container full of flowers, fruits, and sprouts of grain.

source_sentence: 唯願慈悲普皆攝受，與我成就滿菩提願。
translation: Please have mercy and compassion on all of them and grant me the fulfillment of the vow for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若我盡此賢劫，於一切佛剎，以女人形惠施眾生飲食華果，乃至成熟眾生，以是福報令我六波羅蜜具足圓滿，得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及我所化眾生，皆悉供給無所乏少。」
translation: If I were to spend the whole of this good eon in all the buddha bases, giving sentient beings in the form of a woman to drink flowers and fruits and ripening sentient beings, the result of that merit would cause me to fully consummate the six perfections, achieve unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, and offer them all, without fail, to the sentient beings I've created."

source_sentence: 是時，一切諸佛同作是言：「善哉！
translation: At that point, all the buddhas together said, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝能以清淨心建立大施，及供養一切諸佛世尊，我已受汝所施。
translation: If you can establish a great offering with a pure heart and make offerings to all the world-honored buddhas, I will accept your offerings.

source_sentence: 令汝如所求如所為求，乃至爾所時求滿汝意願，功德成就神通成就。」
translation: Let your requests be as you seek and as you seek them, up to the point where your requests fulfill your wishes and merits, and your supernormal powers are accomplished."

source_sentence: 時，息華魔復作是言：「所有城邑村落，有能受持開示此經典者，書寫經卷及供養者，我當於彼國邑聚落，乃至邊壃有人住處，叢林華果五穀秀實皆令成就。
translation: Śiva Māra then again said, "If there are cities, towns, and villages that can accept, maintain, and teach this sūtra, write scrolls on it, and make offerings to it, I will make the forests, flowers, fruits, and grains that grow in abundance in those cities, towns, and villages, as well as in the boundary areas where people live.

source_sentence: 彼一切處所有眾生，乃至禽獸食華果者皆令充足。
translation: All living beings and even animals in those places that eat flowers and fruits will be made abundant.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有一人於其方所應食果實，竟不得食而命終者，我今即為欺誑一切三世諸佛及此大會諸聖眾等，亦莫令我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: "If there's one person in a place where they should eat the fruit of Buddhahood who's not allowed to eat it and whose life ends, I would deceive all the buddhas of the three times and the noble people of this assembly, and I wouldn't be allowed to attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 唯除業盡及命盡者，所有華果美味之屬，皆令眾生普得受用。
translation: Except for those whose actions have ended and whose lives have ended, I would allow sentient beings to enjoy all the flowers and fruits that are delicious.

source_sentence: 以此因故，令我具足檀波羅蜜。
translation: As a result, I've perfected the perfection of the perfection of giving.

source_sentence: 若諸眾生食果實者，是等眾生當起悲心互相利益，以此因故，令我具足尸波羅蜜。
translation: If sentient beings eat the fruit of Buddhahood, these sentient beings will arouse compassion for each other's benefit, and as a result, I've perfected the perfection of the perfection of moral discipline.

source_sentence: 若諸眾生受用華果，是等眾生起柔軟心，以此因故，令我具足羼提波羅蜜。
translation: If sentient beings eat the fruit of flowers, these sentient beings will become tenderhearted, and this will cause me to fully possess the perfection of the perfection of kṣatriya.

source_sentence: 若諸眾生受用華果，當令堅固精進之心，以此因故，令我具足毘梨耶波羅蜜。
translation: If sentient beings accept the fruit of flowers, it will cause them to have a mind of resolute effort, and as a result, it will make me perfect the perfection of the perfection of vairocana.

source_sentence: 若諸眾生受我華果，心心數法起無常想，以此因故，令我具足禪波羅蜜。
translation: If sentient beings accept the fruit of my flowers and give rise to perceptions of impermanence in their minds and mental factors, this will cause me to fully possess the perfection of the perfection of meditation.

source_sentence: 若諸眾生乃至禽獸食華果者，皆令樂法得住性空，以此因故，令我具足般若波羅蜜。
translation: If sentient beings and even animals eat the fruit of flowers, it causes them to attain abiding emptiness in the nature of pleasant dharmas, and as a result, I've perfected the perfection of prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「復次，隨所有處行此法門，彼諸眾生所有種種，稻禾麥豆雜類果實，我以是故心甚勤勞，為彼眾生多獲種子，亦令一切倉窖盈滿。
translation: "Furthermore, following this teaching wherever I go, I've worked very hard at heart to obtain much seed for those sentient beings and to fill all their barns with the fruits of rice, wheat, and beans.

source_sentence: 若彼眾生乃至禽獸食華果者，以此因故，令我具足般若波羅蜜，若一一方流通開示此法門處，隨彼所有甘蔗蒱桃石榴等果，一切汁味無不香美倍勝於常，眾生所有瓶[(工*几)/瓦]甕器皆令盈滿。
translation: If there are sentient beings or even animals that eat flowers and fruits, this is the cause that makes me perfect the perfection of prajñā-pāramitā, and if I were to explain this teaching in one place, then whatever sugarcane, peaches, pomegranates, and other fruits they have, their juice would taste delicious and twice as good as usual, and all the jars [(work*kil)/tile] and urns of sentient beings would be filled to overflowing.

source_sentence: 若諸眾生受用食時，悉得增長智慧色力，以此因故，令我具足般若波羅蜜。
translation: If all sentient beings increase their wisdom and strength of form when they eat, this will cause me to fully realize the perfection of prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得如是六波羅蜜淨因滿足，令我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，一切諸佛及一切菩薩摩訶薩眾，當隨喜我能作如是菩薩行相。」
translation: As a result of fulfilling the pure causes of these six perfections, I've attained supreme perfect enlightenment, and all the buddhas and all the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas will agree with me that I can perform such bodhisattva actions."

source_sentence: 時，大眾中一切諸佛默然許可。
translation: At that point, all the buddhas in the assembly quietly approved.

source_sentence: 爾時，有佛名曰智星，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: At the time, there was a Buddha named Chisō Xing who said, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝當普請一切眾生為大施主，以如是相如是力如是精進勇猛，如是劬勞不息，汝善男子！
translation: "You good sons, you must universally invite all sentient beings to be great benefactors, and with such characteristics and such power and such diligence and boldness, you must not stop exerting yourself in this way!

source_sentence: 能作如是相力精進者，即是菩薩丈夫所作。」
translation: Someone who makes such effort with the power of characteristics is a bodhisattva, and that's what a great man does."

source_sentence: 時息華魔於智星佛前，聞如是安慰已，即白佛言：「唯願世尊一心護念，與我善業成就滿足，在在處處若此法門不流行處，我與眷屬不入其境。
translation: After hearing this reassurance, Śiva Māra said to the Buddha, "Please, Bhagavān, be mindful of this and help me to fulfill my good actions so that everywhere and everywhere that this teaching doesn't flourish, my followers and I won't enter its territory.

source_sentence: 若是法門流行之處，我與眷屬恒住於彼，令其土地穀藥華果倍復滋茂，色香美味悉皆具足，眾生受用隨時飽滿，倉廩地窖悉皆盈積，乃至畜生所食之物亦令豐穰，以此善根令我具足般若波羅蜜。
translation: If this teaching were to become popular, my retinue and I would always stay there, so that the land would be replete with grains, medicines, flowers, and fruits, the land would be replete with color, fragrance, and taste, the land would be full of food for sentient beings, the warehouses and cellars would be full, and the food for animals would be abundant, and this good root would make me perfect the perfection of prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我盡千劫於此佛剎，令諸眾生如是相如是力如是受用飲食，當令充足。
translation: For a thousand eons, I've caused sentient beings at this Buddha's temple to have this kind of appearance, this kind of strength, and this kind of access to food and drink, which will be sufficient.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是無量無數恒河沙等五濁世界一一剎土，誓於千劫大作佛事，然後我身當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Thus, in each of these five turbid worlds and buddha lands, which are countless and limitless, I vow to do great buddha-works for a thousand eons, after which I myself will attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 在會大眾菩薩摩訶薩，及一切梵釋天王、護世四王、天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、鳩槃茶、毘舍遮、人、非人等，從一切佛剎中來者，皆共同聲，唱如是言：「善哉！
translation: The assembled masses of bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and all the Brahmakāyika gods, the four guardian kings, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, kaluras, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, kumbhāṇḍas, piśācīs, humans, nonhumans, and so forth, who had come from all the buddha bases, all spoke together, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！

source_sentence: 善男子！

source_sentence: 汝能以此女形修行六波羅蜜成熟眾生，以我等福德精進劬勞力故，唯願令汝所作佛事當得成就。」
translation: If you can cultivate the six perfections in this woman's form to ripen sentient beings, I wish only that you would accomplish the Buddha-works you do because of our virtuous effort."

source_sentence: 釋迦如來作如是言：「誰有憐愍此善男子，能佐助者？」
translation: The Śākyamuni Tathāgata said thus, "Who is there a kind man who takes pity on this good man and can assist him?"
